item.title: El Macho
item.description: El Macho is a 1977 Italian-Argentine Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Marcello Andrei.

item.title: Adiós, Sabata
item.description: Adiós, Sabata is a 1970 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Gianfranco Parolini. It is the second film in The Sabata Trilogy by Parolini. Yul Brynner takes over the lead role from Lee Van Cleef, who stars in the first and third films.

item.title: The Price of Death
item.description: The Price of Death is a 1971 Italian Western film directed by Lorenzo Gicca Palli and starring Klaus Kinski and Gianni Garko. Some DVD releases feature the title Der Galgen Wartecht Schon, Amigo!.

item.title: Pecos Cleans Up
item.description: Pecos è qui: prega e muori is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Maurizio Lucidi.
